text: Art of Supremacy
The art of Hoeth's swordsmanship reaches perfection in the hands of these masters. Their unfortunate foes will become stepping stones on their path to ultimate mastery.
Embers of the Phoenix King
The King's Wings have basked countless times in the light of the Eternal Flame, blessed by the gods themselves.
Shield of the Queen
The Queen's Knights of Avelorn are the Eternal Queen's most devoted defenders. On the battlefield, they will raise her banner and fight in her name.
Blade of the Queen
The Queen's Knights of Avelorn are the Eternal Queen's most devoted defenders. On the battlefield, they will raise her banner and fight in her name.
Skyborne Deadeye
With pale eyes watching the earth from the skies, the Watchers swiftly eliminate Ulthuan's greatest threats.
Call to Charge
The Luminants spearhead the lines of order, tearing apart enemy formations. When their horns resound, all elves know it is time to attack.
Tidemancers
These masters launch a storm of attacks upon their enemies, striking at a much higher frequency than most units.
Clarity of the Current
Tidemancers are duel specialists, capable of detecting even the subtlest enemy movements, deflecting attacks, bypassing armor, and striking with deadly precision.
Malign Intent
Anlec is the foothold of elven warfare. The Throne Guard, hardened by centuries of turmoil, have embraced the ways of bloodshed, with some believing their minds are ruled by the God of Murder.
Champions of the Pure Mane
The Lion Heralds are the guardians of the White Lion homeland. Their names are legendary among every White Lion Guard.
Lords of the Sky
When you look up at these winged creatures, you realize the skies belong to them.
Pride of the Realm
With each attack, the knights quell Caledor's fury, delivering punishment and peace to the realm's enemies through the merciful dragons.
Bow of Stillness
They are called Windcallers because their arrows, raining down like a storm, are believed to halt any tempest.
